_xResult.title: Dance Linen Wrap Top
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen wrap top with V-back
_xResult.longdesc:
Linen already conveys an air of calm and zen, but this linen wrap choli top takes it to a whole different level. With the thick linen straps and loose elbow-length sleeves, this top is pure relaxation. The medium-weight fabric is 100% linen and comes pre-washed and softened, so you won't have to deal with any shrinking.

 

The Dance top is available in 31 different colors. Please choose from the color palette in last picture, and provide your color preference information during checkout.

 

Shantima uses only Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying. No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
